summary:
Driven teamplayer, strong analyst, project manager, thinking out of the box, creative, tact, strong coordinator, responsible, sensitive, loyal and capable of simplifying complex processes. 

ERP/SAP consultant with extensive experience in Finance and Sales. Broad knowledge in the integration between Finance, Logistics, Sales, FSCM, BW and SAP Portal. 

Experienced in working in Global environments.
